rainbow: Nitrate Explorer 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    My First Plot Plots a simple ggplot2 boxplot of the rivers_data dataset, with Site on the x-axis and Nitrate on the y-axis.

    my_first_plot.Rd

    This function visualises nitrate concentration differences between sampling sites in the synthetic rivers_data dataset. It uses a clean minimal theme and returns the ggplot object so it can be further customised.

    Usage

    my_first_plot()

    Value

    A ggplot2 object containing the plot.

    Examples

    devtools::load_all()
